name: Compressed experiment
description:
The game is very simple and minimalistic, your only goal is to run the course and get the best time possible. You can try to compete with others and try to get into top 10. There is not much else at this point, only one level and one leaderboard.

The game was supposed to be done as a part of Brackeys Game jam 2022.1 but it wasn't due to a lack of time.

My main gol was to create a simple platformer with working online highscore and I will continue improoving that knowledge. I would like to release a new map every 1-2 weeks and add some more features and content, yet still, try to keep it very minimalistic.

Please feel free to let me know any feedback or what you would like to see here in the future.

Thanks for playing
